column1: Smoque BBQ////The staff was very helpful in making sure our group of 6 was seated together
column3: considering how busy the place was. The staff also does a good job keeping things moving
column4: without trying to rush one out of the place. As for ambiance
column6: it's a BBQ joint. I saw families and people from every walk of life. It can be a bit loud in there
column7: with everyone talking. (Which kinda surprised me. The food is so great
column8: you'd think you'd only hear moans of ecstasy
column10: some people actually manage to talk!)
